    Mouse data analysis

    mouse_cluster_analysis.Rmd

    Data

    library(SharedPeptidesIso)
data("mouse_cluster")
knitr::kable(mouse_cluster)
    rep sequence precursor_scan charge_in_scan intensity isoDistr P35278 P61021 Q9CQD1

    Nonlinear model

    model_full = IsoAPQModel(
  log(intensity/isoDistr) ~ log(..) + (1|precursor_scan) + (1|charge_in_scan) +
    sequence + rep,
  mouse_cluster
)
#> Preparing model design...
#> boundary (singular) fit: see ?isSingular
#> Fitting nonlinear mixed effects model, please wait...
#> Computing hessian, please wait...

    Coefficients:

    round(coef(model_full), 3)
#>                  sigma         charge_in_scan         precursor_scan 
#>                  0.746                  0.000                  0.000 
#>                 P35278                 P61021                 Q9CQD1 
#>                 14.317                 12.378                 14.445 
#>   sequenceGVDLQESNPASR   sequenceNEPQNAAGAPGR   sequenceSEPQNLGGAAGR 
#>                  2.344                  1.346                  3.616 
#> sequenceTAMNVNEIFMAIAK sequenceTSMNVNEIFMAIAK     sequenceYHSLAPMYYR 
#>                  2.037                  0.900                  0.896 
#>                   rep2                   rep3 
#>                  0.213                 -0.031

    Protein abundances:

    getIsoProteinAbundances(model_full)
#>   P35278   P61021   Q9CQD1 
#> 14.31678 12.37750 14.44452

    Compare with linear model based on unique peptides:

    data("mouse_cluster_unique")
head(mouse_cluster_unique)
#>    rep     sequence precursor_scan charge_in_scan intensity    isoDistr P35278
#> 1:   1 GVDLQESNPASR          10498        10498_2 5778987.0 0.510592457      1
#> 2:   1 GVDLQESNPASR          10498        10498_2 3903420.8 0.322780609      1
#> 3:   1 GVDLQESNPASR          10498        10498_2  891180.6 0.122477094      1
#> 4:   1 GVDLQESNPASR          10498        10498_2 1807833.4 0.007872885      1
#> 5:   2 GVDLQESNPASR          10672        10672_2 6276276.0 0.510592457      1
#> 6:   2 GVDLQESNPASR          10672        10672_2 3482244.8 0.322780609      1
#>    P61021 Q9CQD1 IsUnique
#> 1:      0      0     TRUE
#> 2:      0      0     TRUE
#> 3:      0      0     TRUE
#> 4:      0      0     TRUE
#> 5:      0      0     TRUE
#> 6:      0      0     TRUE
model_lin = lme4::lmer(
  log(intensity/isoDistr) ~ 0 + P35278 + P61021 + Q9CQD1 +
    (1|precursor_scan) + (1|charge_in_scan) +
    sequence + rep,
  data = mouse_cluster_unique
)
#> fixed-effect model matrix is rank deficient so dropping 3 columns / coefficients
#> boundary (singular) fit: see ?isSingular
    fixed_coefs = lme4::fixef(model_lin)
fixed_coefs[1:3]
#>   P35278   P61021   Q9CQD1 
#> 16.53002 16.16910 15.34498
